Language.name: en
Language.Text:
Do you think that the Traffic monsters are dumb? Let's see! Now you'll have to beat one in a logical game.
Game rules:
Players gradually remove stones from three piles. With each move a player must remove at least one stone. Maximum number of removed stones is not limited, however in each turn you may only remove stones from one pile. The players take turns. The player that removes the last stone wins.
A random number of stones is removed from each pile at the start to avoid each game being identical. After this you can select, who will start, you or enemy monster.
